posts.post_content:
I hate this card, and by that I mean I wish I had one! ;-)

When he gets to use Liliana's Ultimate I just cry :'(

Posted By: Salient (1/11/2012 4:11:27 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I can't take it. Please pay attention:  
  
**Kadence**: Shroud would not protect your Lord of Extinction - or any other creature - from the effect of Plague Wind. The only things that would prevent a creature from going to the graveyard as a result of this Sorcery would be Indestructible. Persist would bring it back AFTER it went toward the graveyard, if it didn't have a negative counter, already.  
  
Shroud protects something FROM BEING TARGETED. **TARGETED**. Plague Wind does not target.  
  
This is the problem with fancy keywords. Cards just need to have things spelled out clearly, instead. Imagine that.
posts.html:
I can't take it. Please pay attention:

Kadence: Shroud would not protect your Lord of Extinction - or any other creature - from the effect of Plague Wind. The only things that would prevent a creature from going to the graveyard as a result of this Sorcery would be Indestructible. Persist would bring it back AFTER it went toward the graveyard, if it didn't have a negative counter, already.

Shroud protects something FROM BEING TARGETED. TARGETED. Plague Wind does not target.

This is the problem with fancy keywords. Cards just need to have things spelled out clearly, instead. Imagine that.

posts.post_content: Good card for [Lord of Extinction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lord of Extinction) as well. Me and some of my friends were just doing a casual 3-way match with teams of two people, just to see how it went, and one of my friends was playing a deck that focused on resurrecting and the like. There were a ton of creatures on the field, and he had this card ready to use, but my Lord of Extinction just happened to have Shroud, so he knew what would happen if he did. :B He never got a chance to use it.
